title: THERANDOMDUDDEFR
author: THERANDOMDUDDEFR
content: Hi,I want to spend my USD from my personal Payoneer account (verified) for BTC or USDT or USDC (I'm open to other main crypto).I'd like a 5% or lower fee if possible.My Telegram: @francesko004Also don't contact me with intention to scam! I wont go first.

comments.author: MadHatters
comments.body: Well, lucky someone who sent you first

comments.author: ICYNOTE2023
comments.body: Quote from: THERANDOMDUDDEFR on July 01, 2023, 10:44:44 AMHi,I want to spend my USD from my personal Payoneer account (verified) for BTC or USDT or USDC (I'm open to other main crypto).I'd like a 5% or lower fee if possible.My Telegram: @francesko004Also don't contact me with intention to scam! I wont go first.you are a scammer. that's why you won't go first. if you do want to trade, you should have given the option of inviting a middle man
